remarks: The function operation applied to the addition for functions (with the same domain) into a monoid is a function (with the same domain) into the monoid.  (Contributed by AV, 6-Apr-2019.)
statement:
ofaddmndmap.r $e |- R = ( Base ` M ) $.
ofaddmndmap.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` M ) $.
ofaddmndmap $p |- ( ( M e. Mnd /\ V e. Y /\ ( A e. ( R ^m V ) /\ B e. ( R ^m V ) ) ) -> ( A oF .+ B ) e. ( R ^m V ) ) $.
